doc:
Marjorie Lord https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marjorie_Lord 0 Marjorie Lord (née Wollenberg; July 26, 1918 – November 28, 2015) was an American television and film actress. She played Kathy "Clancy" O'Hara Williams, opposite Danny Thomas's character on The Danny Thomas Show and later Make Room for Granddaddy. Marjorie_Lord ( née_Wollenberg ; July_26_,_1918 – November_28_,_2015 ) was an_American_television_and_film_actress . She played Kathy_"_Clancy_"_O'Hara_Williams , opposite_Danny_Thomas 's_character on The_Danny_Thomas_Show and later_Make Room for Granddaddy .
